attributes.action: immediately remove Sir Ian Blair from his position of Metropolitan Police Commissioner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the Old Bailey decision finding the Met Police guilty of of endangering the public over the fatal shooting of a man officers mistook for a suicide bomber some kind of repercussion must take place.

Whilst promotions have occurred for senior officers involved in the tragedy we feel there is only one option left to the public. We wish to have our voices heard on this disturbing show of incompetence from the police force in charge of supposedly protecting us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
